query:
SELECT 
  'Hotels' as category, 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hotels WHERE tripId = 1) as slovakia_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hotels WHERE tripId = 2) as demo_count
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Transportation',
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transportation WHERE tripId = 1),
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transportation WHERE tripId = 2)
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Routes',
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trip_routes WHERE tripId = 1),
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trip_routes WHERE tripId = 2)
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Restaurants',
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM restaurants WHERE tripId = 1),
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM restaurants WHERE tripId = 2)
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Payments',
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM payments WHERE tripId = 1),
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM payments WHERE tripId = 2)
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Travelers',
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trip_travelers WHERE tripId = 1),
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trip_travelers WHERE tripId = 2)
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Checklist',
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM checklist_items WHERE tripId = 1),
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM checklist_items WHERE tripId = 2)
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Documents',
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM documents WHERE tripId = 1),
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM documents WHERE tripId = 2);
